alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 3:14PM EST until November 16 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Rutland and Windsor Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as snow late this evening, mixing with sleet and freezing rain early Wednesday morning. A change over to plain rain is expected over the Connecticut River Valley by midday. Precipitation will wind down quickly during the afternoon hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
